Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
Represents a flight in the booking system, including its details, capacity, pricing, and passenger information. Flights can be of type BUDGET (single class) or COMMERCIAL (multiple classes).

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, BigDecimal economyPrice, int capacity)
      Constructor for creating a new Budget flight. Budget flights only have an Economy class.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the flight.
      flightNumber - The flight's alphanumeric identifier.
      origin - The departure airport/city.
      destination - The arrival airport/city.
      departureDate - The scheduled date of departure.
      economyPrice - The base price for the Economy class.
      capacity - The total passenger capacity for the flight (all Economy).

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, BigDecimal economyPrice, int totalCapacity, FlightType flightType, Map<CommercialClassType,Integer> classCapacities)
      Constructor for creating a new Commercial flight. Commercial flights support multiple commercial classes (Economy, Premium Economy, Business, First).
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the flight.
      flightNumber - The flight's alphanumeric identifier.
      origin - The departure airport/city.
      destination - The arrival airport/city.
      departureDate - The scheduled date of departure.
      economyPrice - The base price for the Economy class, used to derive other class prices.
      totalCapacity - The total passenger capacity across all classes.
      flightType - The type of flight (must be COMMERCIAL for this constructor's intended use).
      classCapacities - A map defining the capacity for each CommercialClassType. If null, default capacities are calculated based on totalCapacity.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableClasses

      public List<CommercialClassType> getAvailableClasses()

    • getPriceForClass

      public BigDecimal getPriceForClass(CommercialClassType classType) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Gets the base price for a specific commercial class on this flight.
      Parameters:
      classType - The CommercialClassType to get the price for.
      Returns:
      The BigDecimal base price for the given class.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If the requested class is not available for this flight type.

    • getCapacityForClass

      public int getCapacityForClass(CommercialClassType classType)

    • getRemainingSeatsForClass

      public int getRemainingSeatsForClass(CommercialClassType classType)

    • isClassAvailable

      public boolean isClassAvailable(CommercialClassType classType)
      Checks if a specific commercial class is available for booking (i.e., has remaining seats).
      Parameters:
      classType - The CommercialClassType to check.
      Returns:
      true if the class is available and has at least one seat, false otherwise.

    • hasAnySeatsLeft

      public boolean hasAnySeatsLeft()

    • getDynamicPrice

      public BigDecimal getDynamicPrice(CommercialClassType classType, LocalDate systemDate) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Calculates the dynamic price for a given commercial class based on the system date and current occupancy. Price can increase closer to departure or with higher occupancy.
      Parameters:
      classType - The CommercialClassType for which to calculate the price.
      systemDate - The current date of the system, used to determine days until departure.
      Returns:
      The dynamically calculated BigDecimal price for the class, rounded to 2 decimal places.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If the requested class is not available for this flight type.

    • hasDeparted

      public boolean hasDeparted(LocalDate systemDate)
      Checks if the flight has already departed or departs on the current system date.
      Parameters:
      systemDate - The current date of the system.
      Returns:
      true if the departure date is on or before the system date, false otherwise.

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Returns a short string representation of the flight details. This includes ID, flight number, origin, destination, departure date, and flight type.
      Returns:
      A String containing a concise summary of the flight.

    • getDetailsLong

      public String getDetailsLong(LocalDate systemDate) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Returns a long string representation of the flight details. This provides a comprehensive overview including all flight attributes, class-specific capacities, base and dynamic prices, remaining seats, and a list of current passengers.
      Parameters:
      systemDate - The current system date, used for dynamic price calculation.
      Returns:
      A String containing detailed information about the flight.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If there's an issue getting the dynamic price for a class.

    • addPassenger

      public void addPassenger(Customer passenger, CommercialClassType classType) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a passenger to the flight in a specific commercial class. This method increments the occupied seats count for the given class.
      Parameters:
      passenger - The Customer to be added as a passenger.
      classType - The CommercialClassType the passenger is booking in.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If the chosen class is full or the customer is already a passenger.

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(Customer passenger, CommercialClassType classType)
      Removes a passenger from the flight. This method decrements the occupied seats count for the class the passenger was in.
      Parameters:
      passenger - The Customer to be removed.
      classType - The CommercialClassType the passenger was originally booked in. (Needed to correctly decrement occupied seats by class.)

    • isDeleted

      public boolean isDeleted()
      Checks if the flight is marked as deleted. Deleted flights are typically hidden from active lists.
      Returns:
      true if the flight is deleted, false otherwise.

    • setDeleted

      public void setDeleted(boolean deleted)
      Sets the deletion status of the flight.
      Parameters:
      deleted - true to mark the flight as deleted, false to mark it as active.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
